sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY (BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID,TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,IS_AUTO_SAVED) VALUES (#id#,#subjectId#,#processCycleId#,#crn#,#title#,sysdate,#updateBy#,#tableBottomNotes#,'N')
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT rbs.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,rbs.SUBJECT_ID,rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID,rbs.CASE_ID, rbs.UPDATED_ON, NVL(rbs.UPDATED_BY,'System') UPDATED_BY, cms.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME SUBJECT_NAME,cmscase.DESCRIPTION FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rbs,RG_SUBJECT cms,CMS_CASECYCLE cmscase WHERE cms.SUBJECT_ID=rbs.SUBJECT_ID and cms.ENTITY_TYPE_ID=#componentLevel# ANd rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID=cmscase.CASECYCLE_ID ANd CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
rbs.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
order by cms.is_primary_sub desc,cms.REPORT_ORDER asc,upper(cms.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME) asc,cmscase.processcycle_order desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#
SELECT PROCESSCYCLEID FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY WHERE SUBJECT_ID=#subId# AND CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
sqlMap.update: update RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY set TITLE = #title#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES=#tableBottomNotes# , PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# , UPDATED_ON=sysdate,UPDATED_BY=#updateBy# where BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID =#id# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY WHERE BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID in (#backInformation_id#)
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST (HISTORY_ID,BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID,TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES)
(select RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.nextval,rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,rg.SUBJECT_ID,rg.PROCESSCYCLEID,rg.CASE_ID,rg.TITLE,sysdate,rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rg where rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#id# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT rghst.UPDATED_ON, rghst.HISTORY_ID,rghst.UPDATED_BY, NVL(rghst.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,' ') TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,cmscase.DESCRIPTION FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST rghst, cms_casecycle cmscase WHERE BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId# AND cmscase.casecycle_id= rghst.processcycleid order by rghst.UPDATED_ON desc
) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#
sqlMap.update: update RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY set TITLE = #title#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES=#tableBottomNotes# , PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# , UPDATED_ON=sysdate,UPDATED_BY=#updateBy#, PARENT_RECORD_ID = #id#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'Y' where BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#autoSaveId#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY WHERE BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#id# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y')
delete FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL
delete FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY where CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rg WHERE upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND rg.PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#
SELECT rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rg WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL
select count(rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID) FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rg WHERE rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY WHERE BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID IN
#ids[]#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rbs,RG_SUBJECT cms,CMS_CASECYCLE cmscase WHERE cms.SUBJECT_ID=rbs.SUBJECT_ID ANd rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID=cmscase.CASECYCLE_ID ANd CASE_ID=#crn# AND cms.ENTITY_TYPE_ID=#componentLevel# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
rbs.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
SELECT count(*) FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST rg where rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId#

SELECT rbs.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,rbs.SUBJECT_ID,rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID,rbs.CASE_ID, rbs.UPDATED_ON,rbs.UPDATED_BY, rbs.TITLE,rbs.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, cms.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME SUBJECT_NAME,cmscase.DESCRIPTION
FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rbs,RG_SUBJECT cms,CMS_CASECYCLE cmscase WHERE cms.SUBJECT_ID=rbs.SUBJECT_ID ANd rbs.PROCESSCYCLEID=cmscase.CASECYCLE_ID AND rbs.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID =#id#

select rbs.subject_id subject_id, rbs.processcycleid Process_Cycle_Id,cs.subject_name subject_name, ccl.DESCRIPTION Process_Cycle from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rbs, RG_SUBJECT cs ,CMS_CASECYCLE ccl where cs.CRN = rbs.case_id and ccl.CASECYCLE_ID= rbs.processcycleid and cs.subject_id =rbs.subject_id and rbs.case_id = #crn# and upper(rbs.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') order by cs.subject_id, rbs.processcycleid

select rbs.processcycleid Process_Cycle_Id,cc.DESCRIPTION Process_Cycle from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rbs, cms_casecycle cc where rbs.subject_id=#subId# and rbs.case_id=#crn# and cc.casecycle_id= rbs.processcycleid and upper(rbs.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') and rbs.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID != #recordId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY (BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID,TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,IS_AUTO_SAVED,PARENT_RECORD_ID) VALUES (#autoSaveId#,#subjectId#,#processCycleId#,#crn#,#title#,sysdate,#updateBy#,#tableBottomNotes#,'Y',#id#)

insert into RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST ( HISTORY_ID, CASE_ID, SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, UPDATED_ON, UPDATED_BY,BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID
)
SELECT RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.nextval,inner_view.* FROM
(SELECT CASE_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,sysdate,#userName# UPDATED_BY ,#recList[]# BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY where BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#recList[]#)
inner_view
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ( select case_id from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rg ,RG_SUBJECT cs where case_id=#crn# and rg.subject_id=cs.subject_id and cs.entity_type_id=#componentLevel# union select case_id from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST rg,RG_SUBJECT cs where case_id=#crn# and rg.subject_id=cs.subject_id and cs.entity_type_id=#componentLevel#
)
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY (BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID,TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES)
select #id#, SUBJECT_ID,#processCycleId#,CASE_ID,TITLE, sysdate,#userName#,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY where BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY where PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# and SUBJECT_ID = #subjectId# and case_id=#crn#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST(HISTORY_ID , BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID ,SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID , CASE_ID , TITLE , UPDATED_ON , UPDATED_BY , TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES )
select RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.nextval,#recordId#, SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID,TITLE, sysdate,UPDATED_BY,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY where BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID=#recordId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON FROM RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY rg WHERE rg.BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_ID = #id#
select NVL(TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,'') TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES from RG_BACKGROUND_SUMMARY_HST where history_id=#recordId#
